message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This takes into account the inflation factor for you.
I propose a 80/20 split, but I'm willing to negotiate
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split. This aims to balance both our interests while accounting for the decreasing value of your share.
I'm willing to meet in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more for my part in this negotiation
